name: The Woodlands
description:
The Woodlands is a casual crafting game that takes the player on a journey through the woods. Meet and aid kind forest creatures as you gather elements from the environment and combine them to meet your friends' needs!

Instructions:

- Collect items from the environment

- Tap on items to place them onto your crafting board and combine them

- Drag your creations towards objects that need fixing or animals that need tools in order to aid them
